\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
&& {(-, ?)_{\mathcal T}} & 0 \\
0 & {\ker [(\pi _i)_S]} & {(-, X_i)_{\mathcal T}} & {F(-)} & 0 \\
0 & {\ker [(\pi _{i+1})_S]} & {(-, X_{i+1})_{\mathcal T}} & {F(-)} & 0
\arrow[from=1-3, to=1-4]
\arrow["{(\kappa _i)_\ast}", from=1-3, to=2-3]
\arrow[from=1-4, to=2-4]
\arrow[from=2-1, to=2-2]
\arrow[from=2-2, to=2-3]
\arrow[from=2-2, to=3-2]
\arrow["{(\pi _i)_S}", from=2-3, to=2-4]
\arrow["{(\phi _i)_\ast}", from=2-3, to=3-3]
\arrow[from=2-4, to=2-5]
\arrow[equals, from=2-4, to=3-4]
\arrow[from=3-1, to=3-2]
\arrow[from=3-2, to=3-3]
\arrow["{(\pi _{i+1})_S}", from=3-3, to=3-4]
\arrow[from=3-4, to=3-5]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
